class_notes: Permission Only - Program Approval to Take Courses Required
course_description: This course will provide an overview of program evaluation, using an applied case study approach. Course assignments include required reading, analysis of case study examples and the development of an actual evaluation plan for an evaluation client.
prerequisites: PRS 500D and PRS 532D and PRS 535D or equivalent transfer credit as prerequisite.
